mapper.insert: insert into FILE_SCAN_LOG (ID, MD5, SCAN_TIME, FILE_PATH, ILLEGAL_WORD) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{md5,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{scanTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{illegalWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into FILE_SCAN_LOG
ID,
MD5,
SCAN_TIME,
FILE_PATH,
ILLEGAL_WORD,

INSERT ALL
insert into FILE_SCAN_LOG ( MD5, SCAN_TIME, FILE_PATH, ILLEGAL_WORD) values ( #{item.md5,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.scanTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.illegalWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL

insert into FILE_SCAN_LOG ( MD5, SCAN_TIME, FILE_PATH, ILLEGAL_WORD) select * from
select #{item.md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as md5, #{item.scanTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} as scanTime, #{item.filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as filePath, #{item.illegalWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as illegalWord from dual
